unknown_responses.rationale: Discusses uncertainty and case details but lacks explicit calming language.
Reports a bare positive fact about past events ('Nothing happened') and a lesson, but lacks explicit calming language about the present.
Reports exposures traced to animals (positive fact) but lacks explicit calming language.
Poses a question but lacks explicit calming language.
Describes looking at epidemiology and reports a positive fact (no respiratory case yet) but lacks explicit calming language.
Poses a question but lacks explicit calming language.
States future knowledge but lacks explicit calming language.
States uncertainty ('We don't know') but lacks explicit calming language.
